description: Monetize your content without compromising your site design or user experience with Prosperent ProsperLinks. Once turned on, ProsperLinks will automatically evaluate your content and convert any direct-to-merchant or direct-to-retailer links into affiliated links that generate revenue with every sale.
name: ProsperLinks

details.Price: Free to install. 70% of revenue paid to website owner.
details.Restrictions:
Website owners from all countries are welcome, however it should be known: matched advertisers are US companies and you will be paid in US dollars.

According to the FTC's 16 CFR § 255.5, you are required to disclose your use of revenue generating links to your readers. Read more details here.

interface.name: Link Optimizer
interface.description: Get your existing merchant links to the highest earning sites automatically. This sometimes means that links to one merchant are diverted to a different merchant that carries the same product to make more money.
